settings.textHeadingItem: How is my Thermi drinkware meant to be used?
settings.textContent: All Thermi drinkware is double wall, vacuum insulated - with the exception of our 15oz pint cup. Our drinks will insulate both hot and cold beverages - with the exception of our 15oz pint cup, which is best suited for cold beverages. Our 18oz and 40oz bottles are not meant for carbonated beverages as pressure will build up when the lid is closed due to the carbonation.

settings.textHeadingItem: How should I care for my Thermi?
settings.textContent: HAND WASH with mild detergent. Please DO NOT use abrasive cleaners. Please clean your bottle, lid, AND o-ring regularly!

settings.textHeadingItem: When will my order ship? How long to receive it?
settings.textContent: We typically ship all orders same day. Please allow up to 1-2 business days for your order to ship.

settings.textHeadingItem: Which shipping carriers do you ship with?
settings.textContent: Orders typically ship via UPS Ground (United Parcel Service). Depending on your order weight and delivery location, we may ship via USPS (United States Postal Service) in some instances.

settings.textHeadingItem: Can I return a custmized order?
settings.textContent: Due to the customized nature of a custom order, we will not be able to accept returns on custom orders.
